alert.note: Alert for Carteret; Craven; Jones; Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 7:01PM EDT until April 26 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Jones County in eastern North Carolina... Southeastern Craven County in eastern North Carolina... Onslow County in eastern North Carolina... Carteret County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 700 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Half Moon to near White Stocking, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Havelock, Morehead City, North Topsail Beach, Newport, Cedar Island, Harkers Island, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, New River Station, Half Moon, Camp Lejeune Center, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, South River, Cape Carteret, North River, Richlands and Davis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
